page.title: 13Guides in Markyate
page.content: Another time we made a chocolate cake with the figures 75 on it and all ate it.We also go on outings.Sometimes we walk to Whipsnade where there is a {TREE CATHEDRAL.}Sometimes we get enrolled on one of these visits.I was enrolled on the top of Dunstable Downs.We raise funds by such things as Jumble Sales and Bazaars.My favourite game at Guides is Rounders. {Cubs Every Tuesday at six thirty we meet at the bottom of Pickford Hill in the Youth & Community Centre, get in our "sixes" and give our "sixer" 25p.Then we have "Grand Howl".After that we play games like "Bull-dog","Cat & Mouse"or "Piggy-back Wrestling",or we work on our Badges such as "First Aid" "Handyman" or "Campers".Then we have "Grand Howl",a prayer and then get dismissed.
